<<UserControl.Resources> <Style x:Key="DiscreteCheckBoxStyle" TargetType="{x:Type CheckBox}"> <Setter Property="SnapsToDevicePixels" Value="true"/> <Setter Property="FocusVisualStyle" <Setter Property="Template"> <Setter.Value> <ControlTemplate TargetType="{x:Type CheckBox}"> <Grid Background="Transparent"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Border Width="12"> <Border.Background> <VisualBrush Opacity="1.0" Stretch="None"> <VisualBrush.Visual> <Path Name="path" Opacity="0.1" Data="M <<Button Content="Refresh (F5)" Command="{Binding Path=RefreshBitmapCommand}" Margin="2" /> <Button Content="Reset zoom" Command="{Binding Path=ResetBitmapCommand}" CommandParameter="{Binding ElementName=zb}" Margin="2" /> <Button Content="Import dpl.c" Command="{Binding Path=ImportDplCCommand}" Margin="2" />.../>

<<Grid.InputBindings> <MouseBinding Gesture="RightClick" Command="{Binding ResetBitmapCommand}" CommandParameter="{Binding ElementName=zb}" /> </Grid.InputBindings> <Border HorizontalAlignment="Stretch" VerticalAlignment="Stretch" ClipToBounds="True"> <controls:ZoomViewbox Stretch="None" ClipToBounds="False" HorizontalAlignment="Stretch" VerticalAlignment="Stretch" ClickedCommand="{Binding Path=SetCoordinatesCommand}" x:Name="zb" > <Image Name="__im" RenderOptions.BitmapScalingMode="NearestNeighbor" UseLayoutRounding="True" Source="{Binding MyBitmap, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" > </Image> </controls:ZoomViewbox> </Border>.../>

<<controls:ZoomViewbox Stretch="None" ClipToBounds="False" HorizontalAlignment="Stretch" VerticalAlignment="Stretch" ClickedCommand="{Binding Path=SetCoordinatesCommand}" x:Name="zb" > <Image Name="__im" RenderOptions.BitmapScalingMode="NearestNeighbor" UseLayoutRounding="True" Source="{Binding MyBitmap, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" > </Image> </controls:ZoomViewbox>.../>

<<Grid> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Label Content="Importeer coordinaten voor fasen en detectie." /> <Label Grid.Row="1" Content="Dit werkt voor dpl.c files waarin X_is/us en Y_is/us op dezelfde regel staan." /> <Label Grid.Row="2" Content="Selecteer het bestand:" /> <controls:FileTextBox Grid.Row="3" Name="FileTextBox" ChooseDialogFilter="*.c|Dpl.c files" /> <StackPanel Grid.Row="4" MinWidth="200"> <Button Margin="2" Content="Importeer" Click="ImportButton_OnClick" IsDefault="True" /> <Button Margin="2" Content="Annuleren" Click="CancelButton_OnClick" IsCancel="True" /> </StackPanel> </Grid>.../>
